tax.desc1: Zonghe Consulting has cooperated with many local governments to build several industrial parks to provide stable, substantial and efficient tax return services for customers from various industries in order to lower the tax burden. The maximum tax refund could reach 80-85% of provincial financial retention.
tax.desc2: Equity transfer|Merger and Acquisition|Exits of Fungds|Reduction of Non-tradable shares。Zonghe Consulting will provide customized tax consultation service for different clients regarding to their business models in a tax efficient manner.
tax.desc3: Business model optimize | Tax structure optimize

service.title5: Construction and Deconstruction on VIE structure

about-us.title: ABOUT ZONGHE.
about-us.desc: 宗赫咨询是国内政策性财税服务机构，拥有卓越的财税团队及丰富的政府资源，为企业客户和高净值个人提供专业财税咨询、投融资顾问等一站式税务筹划服务。成立至今，我们为分布于资本市场、文娱传媒、高科技、教育、医疗等行业的2000+企业提供专业的定制化财税服务。宗赫咨询作为数十个区域政府的战略合作机构，为地方政府在招商引资、产业引导基金及区域产业布局等方面提供全面的业务支持。
about-us.mission-desc: 以财税为翼，助力中国独角兽企业实现价值腾飞
about-us.vision-desc: 致力于与客户共成长，成为客户首选的税务咨询专家
about-us.sense-of-worth-desc: 安全高效   积极主动   创新拼搏   严谨务实
